Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Rep. Elise Stefanik did not flip off the camera during the impeachment proceedings.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by suggesting that Rep. Stefanik made a vulgar hand gesture when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as the image has been manipulated and there is no evidence to back up the allegation.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the viral photo circulating on Facebook is genuine and portrays Rep. Stefanik flipping off the camera, which is proven to be false.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation by stating that Rep. Stefanik may have voiced her displeasure at the hearing but did not use a vulgar hand gesture.
